sys_update_version.payload: truefalsefalsedesktop,tablet,mobileviewportdefault1{ "mobile": { "height": "250px", "width": "100%" }, "desktop": { "height": "250px", "width": "100%" }, "tablet": { "height": "250px", "width": "100%" } }<!-- AngularJS template with configurable options. Use the `options` object to control dynamic behavior. Example: Display an element when max row count is 10: <div ng-if="options.maxRowCount === 10"></div> The `skeleton-container` class is used for loading placeholders. --> <div class="skeleton-container"> <!-- Header Skeleton --> <div class="skeleton-box skeleton-header"></div> <!-- Body Skeleton --> <div class="skeleton-box skeleton-line"></div> <div class="skeleton-box skeleton-line small"></div> <div class="skeleton-box skeleton-line medium"></div> </div>falsemd9d96ac0797a97214ec453b90f053afae8679ef89cb21120000f8d856634c9c4fsp_instanceadmin2025-12-05 17:05:470f96ec0797a97214ec453b90f053af801992cea7c971db250ec453b90f053af4b992cea7c971db250ec453b90f053af4bsp_instance_0f96ec0797a97214ec453b90f053af80admin2025-12-05 17:06:38<url/><widget_parameters><![CDATA[{ "html": { "value": "<style> .aayos-card-link { display: block; text-decoration: none; color: inherit; margin-bottom: 24px; /* Card spacing */ } .aayos-card { position: relative; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; min-height: 230px; background-size: cover; background-position: center; box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.30); transition: transform 0.18s ease, box-shadow 0.18s ease; } /* DARK OVERLAY (always visible) */ .aayos-card__overlay { position: absolute; inset: 0; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.65); transition: background 0.25s ease; z-index: 1; } /* DARKER OVERLAY ON HOVER */ .aayos-card:hover .aayos-card__overlay { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.82); } /* GREEN GRADIENT — HIDDEN BELOW BY DEFAULT */ .aayos-card__gradient { position: absolute; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: -100%; height: 55%; background: linear-gradient( to top, rgba(0,200,120,0.90), rgba(0,200,120,0) ); z-index: 2; transition: bottom .35s ease-in-out; } /* SLIDE GRADIENT UP ON HOVER */ .aayos-card:hover .aayos-card__gradient { bottom: 0; } /* TEXT LAYER */ .aayos-card__content { position: relative; z-index: 3; height: 100%; padding: 0 20px; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; /* vertical center */ align-items: center; /* horizontal center */ text-align: center; color: #fff; } .aayos-card__title { margin: 0 0 8px; font-size: 26px; font-weight: 700; transition: color .25s ease; } .aayos-card__subtitle { margin: 0; font-size: 15px; opacity: .95; transition: color .25s ease; } /* HOVER → LIGHTER GREEN TEXT */ .aayos-card:hover .aayos-card__title, .aayos-card:hover .aayos-card__subtitle { color: #00e68a; } /* CARD HOVER LIFT */ .aayos-card:hover { transform: translateY(-4px); box-shadow: 0 16px 32px rgba(0,0,0,0.35); } </style> <!-- ADD VEHICLE CARD --><a class="aayos-card-link" href="/aayos_add_vehicle"> <div class="aayos-card" style="background-image: url('/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=7a45184397297214ec453b90f053afad');"><!-- dark overlay --> <div class="aayos-card__overlay"> </div> <!-- sliding gradient --> <div class="aayos-card__gradient"> </div> <!-- centered text --> <div class="aayos-card__content"> <h2 class="aayos-card__title"> </h2> <h2 class="aayos-card__title"> </h2> <h2 class="aayos-card__title"><strong>Add Vehicle</strong></h2> <p class="aayos-card__subtitle">Register or update vehicle records</p> </div> </div> </a>", "displayValue": "<style> .aayos-card-link { display: block; text-decoration: none; color: inherit; margin-bottom: 24px; /* Card spacing */ } .aayos-card { position: relative; border-radius: 10px; overflow: hidden; min-height: 230px; background-size: cover; background-position: center; box-shadow: 0 10px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.30); transition: transform 0.18s ease, box-shadow 0.18s ease; } /* DARK OVERLAY (always visible) */ .aayos-card__overlay { position: absolute; inset: 0; background: rgba(0,0,0,0.65); transition: background 0.25s ease; z-index: 1; } /* DARKER OVERLAY ON HOVER */ .aayos-card:hover .aayos-card__overlay { background: rgba(0,0,0,0.82); } /* GREEN GRADIENT — HIDDEN BELOW BY DEFAULT */ .aayos-card__gradient { position: absolute;
